DOC.brief_summary: The purpose phase 1 trial investigate local tolerability finger follow exposure PEP005 Gel 0.015 % 0.05 % hand wash daily , 2 3 consecutive day .
DOC.brief_title: PEP005 Gel - Evaluation Local Tolerability After Exposure Ingenol Mebutate Gel Followed Hand Washing Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Must male female least 18 year age Female patient must : nonchildbearing potential childbearing potential negative serum urine pregnancy test use effective contraception Ability provide inform consent Have receive treatment immunomodulators , interferon/interferon inducer systematic medication suppress immune system last 4 week Exposed prescribed systemic ( take tablet , injection etc ) topical ( gel , cream , lotion ) medication within last 7 day Have sign skin irritation damage skin around dominant index finger Have work occupation high risk contact irritative material ( eg . chemical , paint ) hand , especially finger Those currently participate clinical trial Those know suspect able comply requirement protocol Females pregnant breastfeeding
